request.description: Log into an existing Violet account with a username and password. If sucessful an access token will be returned in the response body for use in additional requests against the API.

response.name: successful operation

request.description: Refreshes a Users token. Pass the "refresh_token" value provided in the response body of a login request in the "X-Violet-Token" header.

response.name: successful operation

request.description:
Creates a new empty cart.

By setting the 'apply_current_user' flag to true the user associated with the current access token will be applied to the cart. If the user has an existing shipping address and/or billing address saved to their account these will automatically be applied to the cart. Only applies to oAuthed customer transactions.

By setting the 'default_payment_method' flag to true the default payment method, if one exists, of the user associated with the current token will be applied to the cart. Only applies to oAuthed customer transactions.

Use the optional 'app_order_id' parameter to map the newly created cart to an ID in your systems.

response.name: successful operation

request.description:
Creates a new empty cart.

By setting the 'apply_current_user' flag to true the user associated with the current access token will be applied to the cart. If the user has an existing shipping address and/or billing address saved to their account these will automatically be applied to the cart. Only applies to oAuthed customer transactions.

By setting the 'default_payment_method' flag to true the default payment method, if one exists, of the user associated with the current token will be applied to the cart. Only applies to oAuthed customer transactions.

Use the optional 'app_order_id' parameter to map the newly created cart to an ID in your systems.

response.name: successful operation

request.description:
Creates a new empty cart.

By setting the 'apply_current_user' flag to true the user associated with the current access token will be applied to the cart. If the user has an existing shipping address and/or billing address saved to their account these will automatically be applied to the cart. Only applies to oAuthed customer transactions.

By setting the 'default_payment_method' flag to true the default payment method, if one exists, of the user associated with the current token will be applied to the cart. Only applies to oAuthed customer transactions.

Use the optional 'app_order_id' parameter to map the newly created cart to an ID in your systems.

request.description:
Creates a new webhook for the desired event. The remote endpoint must be HTTPS.

We currently limit webhooks to one per event per app. If the event is already active on a previously created webhook that existing webhook will be updated with the new endpoint.

response.name: successful operation
response.body:
{
 "event": "<string>",
 "remote_endpoint": "<string>",
 "id": "<long>",
 "app_id": "<long>",
 "status": "<string>",
 "date_created": "<dateTime>",
 "date_last_modified": "<dateTime>"
}

request.description: Retrieves a single webhook by ID.

response.name: successful operation
response.body:
{
 "event": "<string>",
 "remote_endpoint": "<string>",
 "id": "<long>",
 "app_id": "<long>",
 "status": "<string>",
 "date_created": "<dateTime>",
 "date_last_modified": "<dateTime>"
}

request.description: Removes a webhook. Events will immedietly stop posting to this endpoint upon deletion.

item.name: Get Webhook Events by Webhook ID

request.description: Retrieves a single webhook by ID.

 "remote_endpoint": "<string>",
 "id": "<long>",

 "status": "<string>",

 "date_last_modified": "<dateTime>"
}

request.description:
Creates a new empty cart.

By setting the 'apply_current_user' flag to true the user associated with the current access token will be applied to the cart. If the user has an existing shipping address and/or billing address saved to their account these will automatically be applied to the cart. Only applies to oAuthed customer transactions.

By setting the 'default_payment_method' flag to true the default payment method, if one exists, of the user associated with the current token will be applied to the cart. Only applies to oAuthed customer transactions.

Use the optional 'app_order_id' parameter to map the newly created cart to an ID in your systems.

request.description:
Performs a paginated search of all orders. Orders can be searched by 'merchant_id', 'user_id', or a combination of both.

Orders are limited to those placed by your app.

request.description:
Creates a new webhook for the desired event. The remote endpoint must be HTTPS.

We currently limit webhooks to one per event per app. If the event is already active on a previously created webhook that existing webhook will be updated with the new endpoint.

response.name: successful operation
